description:
UPDATE: Fixed Broken URL links to previous winning numbers & repacked to support versions of webOS less than 2.0

Get instant access to the most recent winning numbers for all your favorite Colorado Lottery games! Information is updated after each drawing and gives a detailed analysis of previous winning numbers and trends. Future updates will bring more animations and additional features such as number generation, saving picked numbers and more!

Source code is available via GNU Public license.  Portions of the code used were taken from TXLotto and other open source examples/tutorials.  Special thanks to supergigmega for assistance with this implementation.
